content: Is the PoolingAllocationStrategy related functionality exposed through the language bindings? I can't seem to find anything sounding like it in wasmtime-go, but I could be missing something. (Are there any technological hurdles to this?)
Currently, no, this isn't bound in the C API (and hence not in other languages as well). I don't think there's anything technical blocking this, though, just needs some work on the C API!
